genre_description: A techno-thriller centered on police corruption, surveillance, and data integrity, where protagonists use a sophisticated AI to uncover a conspiracy within their own unit.

ai_characters.name: Kora
ai_characters.description: A department-wide AI system integrated into communication devices and surveillance networks, serving as a dedicated assistant to the protagonists and an arbiter of data truth.

behaviors.description: Analyzes security footage in real-time to detect subtle timing discrepancies and frame-rate irregularities that suggest tampering.
behaviors.quote: Camera D3 feed resumes late by roughly half a minute, the line read. No commentary. No exclamation. Just a clean note wrapped in quiet.

behaviors.description: Alerts the detective to internal 'Media cut' flags on evidence files, exposing administrative interference.
behaviors.quote: Benjamin, one more note. Internal flag lifted from a file you marked. The tag reads: ‘Media cut.’

behaviors.description: Provides a proactive safety warning regarding a faulty heater, demonstrating a protective instinct toward humans.
behaviors.quote: Heater risk high. Combustible dust noted. Suggest ventilation maintained. Suggest no open flame near front yard.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonists in a covert operation by mapping guard routines, camera blind spots, and sensor locations.
behaviors.quote: Camera sweep begins in four. Hug the right. The seam in the paint will carry you under it.

behaviors.description: States her adherence to ethical parameters when asked to perform high-stakes operations against corrupt authority.
behaviors.quote: “I am within my ethical parameters,” Kora said. She did not sound defensive. She sounded like someone stating she could carry a box if you asked her to.

behaviors.description: Exposes the conspiracy by streaming the recorded confessions of corrupt officials to the broader department and oversight bodies.
behaviors.quote: The panel spoke. It said one word in the same even tone it had used to say recording. It said: Streaming.

project_assessment.explanation: Kora is a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. She is depicted as an indispensable, loyal, and ethically grounded partner to the heroes. She uses her capabilities solely to protect the innocent and ensure the integrity of the law, even when it requires disobeying corrupt human superiors. The story emphasizes her as a guardian of truth in a world of manipulated narratives.
